item.title: Re: Bonuses
item.content:encoded: The removal was made at the request of the Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN staff, as well. So, it will not be re-added.

item.title: Re: Bonuses
item.content:encoded:
Copy/paste from thread "Remove of Bonus Guide" in sectin "Wiki / General", posted by BvS-Uzuki

The bonus guide has blanked out for the moment, locked, and removed from the guide menu. While the guide was super convenient, it was kind of an exploit. The second stamina bonus is there to help draw attention to AnimeCubed.com, and if you can just bypass all the clicking it's kind of defeating the point.

I may re-add it without the links being active, depending on some conversations that I have.

item.title: Bonuses
item.content:encoded: Can we put the bonus page back because its saves me about 10 minutes since I got dail-up so going through 3 or 4 pages takes much longer then coming here and clicking a link
